description: The Ordinal Council believes that true ownership of wealth is a fundamental human right that should be accessible to all. We are committed to promoting the principles of decentralization, innovation, and egalitarianism through the Ordinal medium. We believe that by harnessing the innovative spirit of Ordinals and the decentralization ideology of Bitcoin, we can create a world where everyone has full access to true ownership of wealth.
name: The Ordinals Council
